ResearchTabDef.label: Anomalies Expected
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription:
Expansion of void-related technologies by studying unnatural entities.

It uses logic of anomaly research projects.

Progress shown on Anomaly tab.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sleep enhancer serum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize a serum that stabilizes a person's rest efficiency.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->stayed awake for long time and was fired due to be too efficient at work
subject_story->could no longer make excuses due to oversleeping

ResearchProjectDef.label: regen serum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize a serum that increase the body's healing factor.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->everything is healing like a dog's
subject_story->never stays long in the hospital
subject_story->used to be the designated punching bag for mech training
subject_story->was able to regenerate muscles, nerves, and skin, from just the remaining bone of an arm

ResearchProjectDef.label: giant apple inhibitor serum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize a serum that removes the effect given by the Giant Apple.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->no longer afraid of giant apple

ResearchProjectDef.label: implant of forbidden knowledge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to extract seeds from the Giant Apple to create a new implant.

ResearchProjectDef.label: grinder stomach
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce grinder stomach, which replicate Meat Grinder structure.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->could finally win every eating challenge

ResearchProjectDef.label: grinder jaw
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce grinder jaw, which replicate Meat Grinder structure.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was a lifesaver on long missions... until he accidentally ate a spaceship crew
subject_story->could mince a steak in seconds

ResearchProjectDef.label: binging food serum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize a serum that makes person pigging out on food.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->ate all food in the facility
subject_story->stomach rumbling could be heard for several kilometers

ResearchProjectDef.label: hunger suppressor serum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize a serum that temporary changes person's metabolism to increase efficiency of nutrient breakdown.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->survived on one ration for a month
subject_story->wasn't able to fight illness, due to lack of nutrient for immune system

ResearchProjectDef.label: precise orbital beam targeter
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce a targeting unit for a network of power-collection satellites based on understanding of transmitter anomaly.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->the night was bright as day
subject_story->melted every statue in other village
subject_story->was able to prevent enemies from going through narrow canyon

ResearchProjectDef.label: blood-like liquid pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Acquire fundamental knowledge of the blood-like liquid, including its collection through pumps and the separation of bioferrite from blood. This enables the destruction of new Blood Puddles without full study.

ResearchProjectDef.label: blood-like liquid injector
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how create blood-like liquid injectors for on field treatment and how to summon new Blood Lake.

ResearchProjectDef.label: study notes #BL01
study notes #BL02
study notes #BL03
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Acquire knowledge of new operation for fleshmass mutation of host's body from tumor.

Unlocks:
- Operation to incubate fleshmass body mutation;
- Operation to incubate fleshmass organogenesis core.

ResearchProjectDef.label: examine notepad
ResearchProjectDef.description: Examining research notes in a yellow notepad.

ResearchProjectDef.label: provider box
ResearchProjectDef.description: Examining blueprint for provider box and learn asking Provider ritual.

ResearchProjectDef.label: asking provider
ResearchProjectDef.description: Collected research progress will be used as additional sacrifice in Asking Provider ritual.

ResearchProjectDef.label: draw snow army
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn draw Snow Army ritual.

ResearchProjectDef.label: atmospheric cooler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build ice crystal-powered coolers that can effectively cool an entire region.

ResearchProjectDef.label: distabilized ice crystal
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how destabilize ice crystals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: atmospheric controller
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build destabilized ice crystal-powered controller consisting of both bioferrite-powered heaters and ice crystal-powered coolers with higher effeciency to control temperature of an entire region.
